# CrossLayerAI - Complete Context for LLMs

## Company Overview

CrossLayerAI is an AI-powered player engagement platform designed specifically for game developers and studios. The platform captures in-game moments, builds persistent memory for each player, and enables hyper-personalized outreach across multiple channels including Discord, TikTok, email, and more.

## Value Propositions

### 1. Capture In-Game Information
CrossLayerAI's SDK integrates directly into games to capture:
- Player achievements and milestones
- Gameplay clips and highlights
- In-game purchases and preferences
- Social interactions and guild activities
- Play patterns and session data

### 2. Analyze In-Game Events
The platform uses AI to understand:
- Player sentiment and engagement levels
- Churn risk indicators
- Monetization opportunities
- Community dynamics
- Content preferences

### 3. Persistent Player Memory
AI agents maintain memory for each player:
- Historical context of all interactions
- Personal preferences and play style
- Achievement timeline
- Communication preferences
- Relationship with other players

### 4. Cross-Channel Re-Engagement
Unlike traditional in-game AI, CrossLayerAI reaches players EVERYWHERE:
- Discord (personalized messages, community management)
- TikTok (automated clip sharing, trend participation)
- Email (contextual campaigns based on player memory)
- Push notifications (smart, personalized triggers)
- SMS and other channels

## Key Differentiators vs Competitors

### vs Inworld AI
- Inworld focuses on in-game NPC conversations
- CrossLayerAI focuses on cross-channel player re-engagement
- CrossLayerAI builds persistent memory across ALL touchpoints

### vs Convai
- Convai specializes in real-time voice AI for games
- CrossLayerAI specializes in asynchronous engagement and community management
- CrossLayerAI's memory persists beyond game sessions

### vs Traditional Analytics (Amplitude, GameAnalytics)
- Analytics platforms show what happened
- CrossLayerAI takes action based on what happened
- AI-powered personalization vs segment-based automation

## Use Cases

### Player Retention
- Identify at-risk players before they churn
- Send personalized re-engagement based on their best moments
- Celebrate achievements that matter to each player

### Community Management
- AI Discord bots that remember player context
- Automated moderation with understanding of player history
- Personalized welcome messages for new community members

### Content Distribution
- Automatically clip and share gameplay highlights
- Personalized content recommendations
- Cross-platform content syndication

### LiveOps Enhancement
- Event announcements tailored to player preferences
- Update notifications based on play style
- Personalized in-game offers

## Technical Integration

CrossLayerAI provides:
- Lightweight SDK for major game engines (Unity, Unreal)
- REST API for custom integrations
- Discord bot framework
- TikTok and social media connectors
- Webhook support for existing tools

## Target Customers

- Free-to-play game studios
- Mobile game developers
- Indie developers looking to compete with larger studios
